name: run-pty
author: Simon Lydell
description: Run several commands concurrently. Show output for one command at a time. Kill all at once.

scripts.start: node run-pty.js % cat % false % echo hello world % ping localhost % node test-keys.js % node signals.js % node slow-kill.js % node slow-kill.js 2000 "Shutting downâ€¦"
